You cannot paste this section on top of itself. Please select different area.

1: Tap top bar to drop the marker
2: Mark the piece you wish to modify
3: Delete a marker by long pressing top of it
4: You can also preview, delete, copy & paste selected piece of the cast by long pressing top of it
